member.name: IAppxManifestMainPackageDependency.GetName
member.summary: Gets the name of the main package dependency from the AppxManifest.xml.
member.param: The name of the main package dependency.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxManifestMainPackageDependency.GetPackageFamilyName
member.summary: Gets the package family name of the main package dependency from the AppxManifest.xml.
member.param: The package family name of the main package dependency.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxManifestMainPackageDependency.GetPublisher
member.summary: Gets the publisher of the main package dependency from the AppxManifest.xml.
member.param: The publisher of the main package dependency.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxManifestMainPackageDependency
member.summary: Provides access to attribute values of the main package dependency.
